title: Emerald and CZ Chandramukhi Haaram - A Timeless Adornment
materials: Base metal alloy with high-quality CZ stones
and faux pearl accents. Finished with a durable Hyderabadi polish for a long-lasting
features: This exquisite Chandramukhi Haaram features a captivating floral design with emerald green accents. The intricate filigree work showcases the skilled craftsmanship, while the dainty faux pearl drops add a touch of classic elegance. The pendant features a traditional floral and paisley design, set with emerald green and sparkling CZ stones.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for festive occasions (Pandagalu) and formal events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Chandramukhi Haaram blends traditional South Indian design with contemporary style. The high-quality CZ stones offer a dazzling sparkle comparable to diamonds, while the durable Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting beauty. It is a versatile piece that can be paired with both traditional and modern outfits, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. A statement piece perfect for any South Indian bride. Lightweight for comfort during extended wear.
